arguments.name: after
arguments.description: Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.

arguments.description: Returns the last _n_ elements from the list.

arguments.description: Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.

arguments.name: categorySlug
arguments.description: Select only listings with the given category.

arguments.name: useTopicAliases
arguments.description: Also check topic aliases for the category slug

arguments.name: viewerCanAdmin
arguments.description:
Select listings to which user has admin access. If omitted, listings visible to the
viewer are returned.

arguments.name: adminId
arguments.description: Select listings that can be administered by the specified user.

arguments.name: organizationId
arguments.description: Select listings for products owned by the specified organization.

arguments.name: allStates

Select listings visible to the viewer even if they are not approved. If omitted or
false, only approved listings will be returned.

arguments.name: slugs
arguments.description: Select the listings with these slugs, if they are visible to the viewer.

arguments.description: Select only listings where the primary category matches the given category slug.

arguments.description: Select only listings that offer a free trial.

values.description: Order repositories by creation time

values.description: Order repositories by update time

values.name: PUSHED_AT
values.description: Order repositories by push time

values.description: Order repositories by name

values.name: STARGAZERS
values.description: Order repositories by number of stargazers

enums.name: OrderDirection
enums.description: Possible directions in which to order a list of items when provided an `orderBy` argument.

values.name: ASC
values.description: Specifies an ascending order for a given `orderBy` argument.

values.name: DESC
values.description: Specifies a descending order for a given `orderBy` argument.

enums.name: RepositoryAffiliation
enums.description: The affiliation of a user to a repository

values.name: OWNER
values.description: Repositories that are owned by the authenticated user.

values.name: COLLABORATOR
values.description: Repositories that the user has been added to as a collaborator.

values.name: ORGANIZATION_MEMBER
values.description: Repositories that the user has access to through being a member of an organization. This includes every repository on every team that the user is on.

enums.name: SubscriptionState
enums.description: The possible states of a subscription.

values.name: UNSUBSCRIBED
values.description: The User is only notified when particpating or @mentioned.

values.name: SUBSCRIBED
values.description: The User is notified of all conversations.

values.name: IGNORED
values.description: The User is never notified.

enums.name: StarOrderField
enums.description: Properties by which star connections can be ordered.

values.name: STARRED_AT
values.description: Allows ordering a list of stars by when they were created.

enums.name: RepositoryLockReason
enums.description: The possible reasons a given repository could be in a locked state.

values.name: MOVING
values.description: The repository is locked due to a move.

values.name: BILLING
values.description: The repository is locked due to a billing related reason.

values.name: RENAME
values.description: The repository is locked due to a rename.

values.name: MIGRATING
values.description: The repository is locked due to a migration.

enums.name: CollaboratorAffiliation
enums.description: Collaborators affiliation level with a subject.

values.name: OUTSIDE
values.description: All outside collaborators of an organization-owned subject.

values.name: DIRECT
values.description: All collaborators with permissions to an organization-owned subject, regardless of organization membership status.

values.name: ALL
values.description: All collaborators the authenticated user can see.

enums.name: RepositoryPermission
enums.description: The access level to a repository

values.name: ADMIN
values.description: Can read, clone, push, and add collaborators

values.name: WRITE
values.description: Can read, clone and push

values.name: READ
values.description: Can read and clone

enums.name: CommentAuthorAssociation
enums.description: A comment author association with repository.

values.name: MEMBER
values.description: Author is a member of the organization that owns the repository.

values.name: OWNER
values.description: Author is the owner of the repository.

values.name: COLLABORATOR
values.description: Author has been invited to collaborate on the repository.

values.name: CONTRIBUTOR
values.description: Author has previously committed to the repository.

values.name: FIRST_TIME_CONTRIBUTOR
values.description: Author has not previously committed to the repository.

values.name: FIRST_TIMER
values.description: Author has not previously committed to GitHub.

values.name: NONE
values.description: Author has no association with the repository.

enums.name: CommentCannotUpdateReason
enums.description: The possible errors that will prevent a user from updating a comment.

values.name: INSUFFICIENT_ACCESS
values.description: You must be the author or have write access to this repository to update this comment.

values.name: LOCKED
values.description: Unable to create comment because issue is locked.

values.name: LOGIN_REQUIRED
values.description: You must be logged in to update this comment.

values.name: MAINTENANCE
values.description: Repository is under maintenance.

values.name: VERIFIED_EMAIL_REQUIRED
values.description: At least one email address must be verified to update this comment.
